text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @GovMurphy Trump is 100% responsible for the wildfire spread of coronavirus in the USA!  His lies, ego & gross incompetence have caused over 1 million COVID-19 infections; 60,000+ deaths; 30 million unemployed. In January Trump knew pandemic was coming & did nothing - absolutely nothing😡
